section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:Chiffre::Chiffres
Core abstraction of the Chiffres monetary system Chiffre::CyclePhase
Position within a natural or symbolic cycle Chiffre::Ether
Collective monetary field in the Chiffres system Chiffre::EthicsScore
Ethical score associated with an actor or portfolio Chiffre::Memory
Memory of past wallet behavior
